Uses of Interface
org.hibernate.query.sqm.sql.SqmTranslator

  • Packages that use SqmTranslator 
    Package Description
    org.hibernate.dialect
    This package abstracts over the multifarious dialects of SQL understood by the databases supported by Hibernate.
    org.hibernate.query.sqm.mutation.internal  
    org.hibernate.query.sqm.sql
    Package for the translation of SQM into SQL AST
    org.hibernate.query.sqm.sql.internal  

    • Uses of SqmTranslator in org.hibernate.dialect

      Classes in org.hibernate.dialect that implement SqmTranslator 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  SybaseSqmToSqlAstConverter<T extends Statement>
      A SQM to SQL AST translator for Sybase ASE.

    • Uses of SqmTranslator in org.hibernate.query.sqm.mutation.internal

      Classes in org.hibernate.query.sqm.mutation.internal that implement SqmTranslator 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  MultiTableSqmMutationConverter
      Specialized BaseSqmToSqlAstConverter implementation used during conversion of an SQM mutation query tree representing into the various SQL AST trees needed to perform that operation.
